name: description
Brass: In allomancy, brass is considered an external, mental, pushing metal. Burning brass allows the user to dampen or weaken (formally, Soothing) specific emotions in another person. The metal pairing for brass is zinc.

name: book source
Brass: The Final Empire, Chapter 7; The Final Empire, Ars Arcanum; The Final Empire, Allomancy  Alphabetical Reference
